amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the rescission of funds for the National Endowment for the Arts by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to rescind 10% of the funding for the NEA. (The bill rescinds $5 million of the total $168 million appropriated for the NEA in 1995.)

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 260 (Roll no. 249).
